actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to consolidate certain vocational education programs.

summary.text: Vocational Education Consolidation Act - Expands the purposes for which grants to states under the Vocational Education Act of 1963 may be made. Increases from $565,000,000 to $855,000,000 the yearly authorization of appropriations for state vocational education programs and for research and training in vocational education.

titles.title: A bill to consolidate certain vocational education programs.
